name: Silent Star: Blast
description:
Destroy as many asteroids as possible to dominate the leaderboards in this simple to play, yet increasingly challenging, blasting action game.

Choose from 8 ships, each with individual speed, handling, and fire rate/power to find one that suits your play style - whether that's fast paced twitch based, or slow and considered.

Pickups enable your ship to fire faster!

Use the arrow keys to choose your ship/navigate end menu's and hit Enter to Play. Use your mouse to mute Music and FX.

Press P to pause the game.
